CustomField.description: Total time In Presenting per day.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( Presenting__c ),null,
IF((MOD(( Presenting__c /60)/60,1)*60) >= 10,
TEXT(FLOOR( ( Presenting__c/60 )/60)) + "h : " + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( Presenting__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min",
TEXT(FLOOR( ( Presenting__c/60 )/60)) + "h : 0" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( Presenting__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min"
))
CustomField.label: Total Presenting
